EmailTemplate.name: LE-202209-HP-ENT-SEVT-AHIP-CONSUMER-EXPERIENCE-DIGITAL-HEALTH-FORUM.pre-event-1
EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual health management can change lives
EmailTemplate.textOnly: MEET US IN NASHVILLE Consumer Experience & Digital Health Forum September 12-14 When it comes to results-driven innovation, the outcomes of our chronic condition management program speak volumes. If you’re attending the 2022 AHIP Consumer Experience & Digital Health Forum, we invite you to schedule a meeting <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/meet-with-us-at-ahip-cx-digital-health-forum]]> or stop by booth 700 <[[https://cdf22.mapyourshow.com/8_0/exhview/index.cfm?selectedBooth=700]]> to hear more about how our integrated, whole-person care approach is changing the virtual care landscape. Join our speaking session: Integrating Virtual Care for Consumers Managing Multiple Chronic Conditions 10:30 a.m. Central | Tuesday, September 13 ROOM 103 During this session, attendees will hear new research about how consumers with multiple chronic conditions seek and manage care, the impact of mental health needs, and consumer attitudes toward virtual care. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. Unsubscribe <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/subscriptions.html]]> | Privacy <[[https://teladochealth.com/privacy-policy/]]> | Legal Notice <[[https://teladochealth.com/notice-of-non-discrimination/]]> ©Teladoc Health, Inc. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Rd., Purchase, NY 10577
